Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2008 08:26PM IllinoisLady wrote: Never posted here but thought I would say I've lost a little over 30 pounds with two more chemo's to go.  Rads after that, and then a five yr. pill. I was not able to eat much after most of my A/C ( 4 ) txs.  Not so much nausea and vomiting....but food just did not register to me very well.  I usually had to wait til' I passed the nadir point...then I could do fairly well.  Don't know if this will continue but since I was over wt. to start with....I will have a lot of work to do when I finally get past this more intense time and level down.  I have used the South Beach Diet successfully before and the style of eating generally suits me well.  Probably that and a good exercise program.  I'm still losing a bit though I was switched and just finished my second Taxotere--4 required. IllinoisLady---aka/Jackie
